Text:
Trolkan has a point I dont even look at others pages because i can usually use HR as my quick fix and I tend to agree with his selection of movies/shows but Jesus.. (except the movie whiteout what a piece of garbage)
The spam comment on the other movie made me laugh out loud though

@ trolkan:
Excuse me if I sound rude, but where do you get off making demands of a VIP uploaer? And for the record, those "usesless" handheld ups? I use them. They are very useful to me. So in the politest terms, shut your trap and back off HR. KTHXBAI!
